overview.roleDetails: First Android developer, built app from scratch, grew team to 3 developers

companies.name: Rifl Media
companies.description: NYC-based media and technology company focused on web & mobile applications. Founded 2013, offices in New York, Berlin, and Kherson.

description.short: Multi-media platform for presenting and sharing creative content, targeting creative industries.
description.full: Take It To (Takeit.to) was an online multi-media platform developed by Rifl Media for presenting and sharing creative content. The platform targeted creative industries, allowing users to share and present their creative work in an engaging way. I joined as the first Android developer and built the Android app from scratch, eventually growing the Android team to 3 developers as the product expanded.
